com.microsoft.band

Enum ConnectionState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ConnectionState>
      • com.microsoft.band.ConnectionState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ConnectionState>

    public enum ConnectionState
extends java.lang.Enum<ConnectionState>
    Enumeration of the connection states to Microsoft Health's band communication service and the corresponding Microsoft Band

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      BINDING
      State representing that the BandClient is binding to Microsoft Health's band communication service
      BOUND
      State representing that the BandClient is bound to Microsoft Health's band communication service
      CONNECTED
      State representing that the BandClient is bound to Microsoft Health's band communication service and connected to its corresponding Microsoft Band
      DISPOSED
      State representing that the BandClient has been disposed of by Microsoft Health's band communication service
      INVALID_SDK_VERSION
      State representing that the BandClient will not be able to bind to the currently in use Microsoft Health band communication service due to a version mismatch
      UNBINDING
      State representing that the BandClient is unbinding from Microsoft Health's band communication service
      UNBOUND
      State representing that the BandClient is not bound to Microsoft Health's band communication service
